body:
I want this to be fast since we call `tensor.size()` very often. This would be harder with cwrap because:
- We would have to build up a THLongStorage (via THTensor_(newSizeOf)) before converting it to a tuple
- Auto GPU is unnecessary here

It'd be a bunch of wrangling with cwrap + adding THLongStorage\* -> THPSize converter vs. ~15 lines of C
